item.title: Demos, hurdles and demo hurdles
item.description: Demo My script is running. Yes! Small victories regardless of project complexity are awesome. There’s nothing that makes one (at least me) feel more victorious than spending an inordinate amount of time on something that you feel shouldn’t have taken an inordinate amount of time and then finally overcoming the (temporary) hurdle. A won battle can momentarily feel like a conquered war. With the script now working and producing an actual result (and even a confidence percentage of the output printed), it was time to do a demo.
